title: The Adventures of Bob Watson: The Sculpting Trader
summary: Bob Watson, a 39-year-old trader and sculptor, discovers his ability to manipulate metal objects with his mind, leading him to become a superhero who fights crime while balancing his hobbies and day job over a week.
summaryGerman: Bob Watson, ein 39-jähriger Händler und Bildhauer, entdeckt seine Fähigkeit, Metallgegenstände mit seinem Geist zu manipulieren, was dazu führt, dass er ein Superheld wird, der Kriminalität bekämpft und gleichzeitig seine Hobbys und seinen Tagesjob über eine Woche hinweg ausbalanciert.
summaryDutch: Bob Watson, een 39-jarige handelaar en beeldhouwer, ontdekt zijn vermogen om metalen voorwerpen met zijn geest te manipuleren, waardoor hij een superheld wordt die misdaad bestrijdt terwijl hij zijn hobby's en dagbaan in evenwicht houdt gedurende een week.
summaryFrench: Bob Watson, un commerçant et sculpteur de 39 ans, découvre sa capacité à manipuler les objets métalliques avec son esprit, ce qui le conduit à devenir un super-héros qui lutte contre le crime tout en équilibrant ses passe-temps et son travail quotidien pendant une semaine.

story.text: Bob Watson, during a typical trading session, inadvertently bends a metal pen with his mind while stressed, realizing his unique power.
Excited by his newfound ability, Bob experiments by sculpting a steel block into a beautiful artwork without touching it, feeling a surge of creative energy.
Bob rescues a family trapped in a car after a light pole falls, manipulating the metal to free them, and feels a blend of joy and responsibility.
Bob decides to use his powers for good, designing a secret hero identity and costume in his workshop, while feeling hopeful and determined.
First night out as a hero, Bob stops a bank heist by controlling the robbers' weapons, gaining confidence in his role as a protector.
Bob spends the day balancing trading and sculpting, reflecting on how his life has changed and realizing his potential to make a difference.
Bob Watson, now known as 'The Sculptor,' is celebrated in the news as a mysterious new hero. He spends a quiet day sculpting, feeling content and fulfilled.

ending: Bob Watson, trading and sculpting by day, shaping the world for the better by night.
moral: Embrace your unique skills; they might just make you a hero.
